text: Miao is Candy Lo's 1st full studio album. It was released on 2 December 1998, one day after her debut EP. The theme of this album is "cat". ==Track listing== #同居角落 Tung4 Geui1 Gok3 Lok6 (Housemate Corner) #接受現實 Gam2 Jip3 Sau6 Yin6 Sat6 (Accepting Reality) #不如睡一睡 Bat1 Yu4 Seui6 Yat1 (Let's Have A Nap) #無人王國 Mou4 Yan4 Wong4 Gwok3 (Uninhabited Kingdom) #夜 Ye6 (Night) #半支怨歌 Bun3 Ji1 Yun3 Go1 (Half Resentful Song) #記念品 Gei3 Nim6 Ban2 (Souvenir) #快感飛行 Faai3 Gam2 Fei1 Haang4 (Pleasant Sensational Flight) #怪怪房 Gwaai3 Gwaai3 Fong4 (A Strange Room) #我很舒服 Ngo5 Han2 Syu1 Fuk4 (I Feel Very Comfortable) Category:Candy Lo albums Category:1998 debut albums Category:Sony Music Hong Kong albums
title: Miao...
